website_summaries.verdict: Sporty basic hoodie that matches almost every outfit. Premium brand with extra-large logo at a budget-friendly price.
pros: Soft and comfortable 66% cotton and 34% polyester blend
Quality weight and weave means it holds up well through washing
Sleeves are an appropriate length, and cuffs are a modest diameter to accommodate wrists of all sizes
cons: Some consumers feel the hoodie is cut narrow or is slim fit
Black will fade after a while

customer_reviews.title: Logo started cracking and peeling on the first wash
customer_reviews.text: I think the one I was shipped may have been a knockoff or something. The letters and logo started peeling off the sweatshirt on the first wash. It's almost like an at home DIY iron-on transfer was applied. I dont know if that's typical for this product, or for Puma, but the one I got was a very poor quality.
